Definition at line 121 of file Handle.hpp.

template<typename Class_T, typename DestructFunctor_T = MemoryDestructor<Class_T>>
void nitf::BoundHandle< Class_T, DestructFunctor_T >::setManaged ( bool  flag  )  [inline]

Sets whether or not the native object is "managed" by the underlying C library. Most objects are in turn managed, but some (such as Records) are not. By setting the object to be un-managed, the native object will be passed to the DestructFunctor_T functor, and most likely destroyed, depending on what the functor does.

Definition at line 141 of file Handle.hpp.

Referenced by nitf::Object< nitf_TREEnumerator >::setManaged().
